Package com.example.Project.Controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.example.Project.Controller.ClientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/clients") public class ClientController extends Object
Controller class to handle HTTP requests related to Client entities.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientController

      @Autowired public ClientController(ClientService clientService)
      Constructs a new ClientController with the specified ClientService.
      Parameters:
      clientService - The ClientService to be used.

  • Method Details

    • getAllClients

      @GetMapping("/get") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Client>> getAllClients()
      Retrieves all clients.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of all clients, or an empty list if none found.

    • getClientById

      @GetMapping("/getbyID/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Client> getClientById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the client if found, or a 404 error if not found.

    • createClient

      @PostMapping("/save") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Client> createClient(@RequestBody Client client)
      Creates a new client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client object to be created.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created client with HTTP status 201 (Created).

    • updateClient

      @PutMapping("updatebyID/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Client> updateClient(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Client clientDetails)
      Updates an existing client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to update.
      clientDetails - The updated client details.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated client if found, or a 404 error if not found.

    • deleteClient

      @DeleteMapping("deletebyID/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteClient(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with no content and HTTP status 204 (No Content).
